meta.content: Gary Independent School District serves kindergarten through twelfth grade in Gary, Texas.

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 1266px; height: 602px;

h1.a: GISD School Closing Through *To Be Determined

section.p: Announcement from Superintendent Todd Greer regarding COVID-19. *This date has been updated as per an executive order from Gov. Abbott on 4/17/20 to extend school closures for the remainder of the school year.

h1.a: New GISD Phone Hours - 8 am to 2 pm, M-F

section.p: **YOU MAY HAVE TO CALL SEVERAL TIMES BEFORE YOUR CALL IS ANSWERED. We are receiving many calls and some may take longer than others. Please keep trying! We appreciate your patience during this time.
During our school closure, student learning continues to be a priority in GISD. More information found here.
GISD is committed and focused on ensuring that our staff and students stay safe. We will be changing previously used procedures starting on Monday, April 6th. More info here.
Grab & Go Breakfast and Lunch pickup is located at the back of the cafeteria Monday & Wednesday from 10 am to 12 pm. More info here.
